markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Resonating Ammunition](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1031)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Sonic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=147" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 175 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 1,200 gp

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** [arrow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=83), [bolt](/Weapons.aspx?ID=81)

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The end of this ammunition is a metallic tuning fork with magical etchings. When an activated _resonating arrow_ hits its target, the tuning fork resonates with residual energy from the shot, transforming it into dangerous sound waves. This deals 5d10 sonic damage to the target and each creature within 10 feet of it with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) DC 28 Fortitude save.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Resonating Ammunition
